org.jamwiki.parser

Class ParserUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jamwiki.parser.ParserUtil

  • public class ParserUtil
extends Object
    This class provides utility methods for use with the parser functions.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ParserUtil() 

    • Method Summary

      Using the system parser, parse an edit comment.
      static ParserOutput parseMetadata(ParserInput parserInput, String content)
      This method provides a way to parse content and set all output metadata, such as link values used by the search engine.
      static String parseMinimal(ParserInput parserInput, String raw)
      Perform a bare minimum of parsing as required prior to saving a topic to the database.

      Retrieve a default ParserOutput object for a given topic name.

      Given a topic name, return the parser-specific syntax to indicate a page redirect.

      When editing a section of a topic, this method provides a way of splicing an edited section back into the raw topic content.

    • Method Detail

      • parse

        public static String parse(ParserInput parserInput,
                           ParserOutput parserOutput,
                           String content)
                    throws ParserException
        Using the system parser, parse system content.
        Parameters:
        parserInput - A ParserInput object that contains parser configuration information.
        parserOutput - A ParserOutput object that will hold metadata output. If this parameter is null then metadata generated during parsing will not be available to the calling method.
        content - The raw topic content that is to be parsed.
        Returns:
        The parsed content.
        Throws:
        ParserException - Thrown if there are any parsing errors.

      • parseEditComment

        public static String parseEditComment(ParserInput parserInput,
                                      String content)
                               throws ParserException
        Using the system parser, parse an edit comment.
        Parameters:
        parserInput - A ParserInput object that contains parser configuration information.
        content - The raw topic content that is to be parsed.
        Returns:
        The parsed content.
        Throws:
        ParserException - Thrown if there are any parsing errors.

      • parserOutput

        public static ParserOutput parserOutput(String content,
                                        String virtualWiki,
                                        String topicName)
                                 throws ParserException
        Retrieve a default ParserOutput object for a given topic name. Note that the content has almost no parsing performed on it other than to generate parser output metadata.
        Parameters:
        content - The raw topic content.
        Returns:
        Returns a minimal ParserOutput object initialized primarily with parser metadata such as links.
        Throws:
        ParserException - Thrown if a parser error occurs.

      • parseMetadata

        public static ParserOutput parseMetadata(ParserInput parserInput,
                                         String content)
                                  throws ParserException
        This method provides a way to parse content and set all output metadata, such as link values used by the search engine.
        Parameters:
        parserInput - A ParserInput object that contains parser configuration information.
        content - The raw topic content that is to be parsed.
        Returns:
        Returns a ParserOutput object with minimally parsed topic content and other parser output fields set.
        Throws:
        ParserException - Thrown if there are any parsing errors.

      • parseMinimal

        public static String parseMinimal(ParserInput parserInput,
                                  String raw)
                           throws ParserException
        Perform a bare minimum of parsing as required prior to saving a topic to the database. In general this method will simply parse signature tags are return.
        Parameters:
        parserInput - A ParserInput object that contains parser configuration information.
        raw - The raw Wiki syntax to be converted into HTML.
        Returns:
        The parsed content.
        Throws:
        ParserException - Thrown if any error occurs during parsing.

      • parserRedirectContent

        public static String parserRedirectContent(String topicName)
                                    throws ParserException
        Given a topic name, return the parser-specific syntax to indicate a page redirect.
        Parameters:
        topicName - The name of the topic that is being redirected to.
        Returns:
        A string containing the syntax indicating a redirect.
        Throws:
        ParserException - Thrown if a parser instance cannot be instantiated or if any other parser error occurs.

      • parseSlice

        public static String[] parseSlice(String context,
                                  Locale locale,
                                  String virtualWiki,
                                  String topicName,
                                  int section)
                           throws ParserException
        When editing a section of a topic, this method provides a way of slicing out a given section of the raw topic content.
        Parameters:
        context - The servlet context.
        locale - The locale for which the content is being parsed.
        virtualWiki - The virtual wiki for the topic being parsed.
        topicName - The name of the topic being parsed.
        section - The section to be sliced and returned.
        Returns:
        Returns A string array consisting of the section name and the raw topic content for the target section.
        Throws:
        ParserException - Thrown if a parser error occurs.

      • parseSplice

        public static String[] parseSplice(ParserOutput parserOutput,
                                   String context,
                                   Locale locale,
                                   String virtualWiki,
                                   String topicName,
                                   int targetSection,
                                   String replacementText)
                            throws ParserException
        When editing a section of a topic, this method provides a way of splicing an edited section back into the raw topic content.
        Parameters:
        parserOutput - A ParserOutput object containing parser metadata output.
        context - The servlet context.
        locale - The locale for which the content is being parsed.
        virtualWiki - The virtual wiki for the topic being parsed.
        topicName - The name of the topic being parsed.
        targetSection - The section to be sliced and returned.
        replacementText - The edited content that is to be spliced back into the raw topic.
        Returns:
        Returns A string array consisting of the section name and the raw topic content including the new replacement text.
        Throws:
        ParserException - Thrown if a parser error occurs.
